summary: Skyrim got bugged and you cannot acces Task Mananger? Here you have Skyrim Closer, a little program that solves it.
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][center]Skyrim Closer[/center][/size]

Your game got thuumed by ice form shout in a blackscreen and you cannot access Windows task mananger?

Here is Skyrim Closer for solve the problem. This little bat file does not need any installers or configuration. Only place it in a easy acces place (W8 start screen, link in your desktop) and open it when skyrim freezes. You just closed it without losing time trying to acces task mananger or resetting pc.

Its useful for testing mods or other stuff that can potentially freezes your game. (frost spells and paralysis deals the same effect).
There are two actual files. One is for Skyrim without SKSE, and the second is for skyrim withÂ [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31737/?]SKSE Patcher for Steam[/url] (As it changes the image name of the game executable)


[center]Thanks for viewing it, and dont forget to endorse if you liked it![/center]
author: Erni Landia
